## Description {#details}

This type defines the behavior following the thin-link phase during ThinLTO.

It encapsulates a backend function and a strategy for thread pool parallelism. Clients should use one of the provided create&#42;ThinBackend() functions to instantiate a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/thinbackend">ThinBackend</a>. Parallelism defines the thread pool strategy to be used for processing.

Definition at line 263 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/lto-h">LTO.h</a>.
